examples.example: 我结识了一位来自远方的朋友，他的故事非常精彩。

translate.english: I got to know a friend from afar, and his story is very wonderful.

examples.example: 来自五湖四海的朋友们欢聚一堂，共同分享着快乐。

translate.english: Friends from all corners of the world gather together and share the happiness together.

examples.example: 来自世界各地的人们汇聚在这里，一起感受着多元文化的魅力。

translate.english: People from all over the world gather here and feel the charm of multiculturalism together.
